description.S3: She's stationed at SubLight Headquarters on the Groundbreaker.

blurb.B1: Take the lift out and you' come out by a group of Mantisaur on the opposite side of the locked gate from the main town.
blurb.B2: You can head to the Unreliable and back to the Groundbreaker to complete the quest by talking to Lylya Hagen at SubLight.
blurb.B3: Finishing the quest gives you 20000xp, SubLight Salvage & Shipping Reputation Up, 2188 Bit Cartridge.
blurb.B4: You can Persuade (100) for 2300xp and 500 Bit Cartridge.

dialog.speaker: LilyaHagen (Female)
dialog.utterance: That gas is going to make us a fucking mint. A hundred twenty-some cubic meters of it, at a million bits a pop?

dialog.speaker: LilyaHagen (Female)
dialog.utterance: Take this. You've earned it. When we get buyers lined up, I'm gonna buy a gold toilet to shit in.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: The height of ambition for us all.

dialog.speaker: LilyaHagen (Female)
dialog.utterance: Monarch isn't exactly a walk down the lanes of Byzantium, but here you are with all your limbs attached. Call me impressed, contractor.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: In case you were curious, no one was following me.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: Do you always send your first-timers into certain peril?

dialog.speaker: LilyaHagen (Female)
dialog.utterance: No one you saw, anyway. Glad to see you're looking out for yourself.

dialog.speaker: LilyaHagen (Female)
dialog.utterance: I guess you're just one of the lucky ones. Look on the bright side, you just started and you're already on the path to a promotion.
